title.rendered: Park Facing Apartment For Sale In Neeti Bagh

content.rendered:
This Luxurious Park Facing Apartment For Sale In Neeti Bagh Is Located in the prime locations of South Delhi this elegant apartment encompasses 4 tidy bedrooms with connected luxury baths, a fully loaded kitchen, stilt parking, and a lift, and faces a lush green park.

♕For Sale
♕325Yds / 4 BHK
♕Park Facing
♕High-End Specifications
♕Automatic Lifts
♕Stilt Parking
♕Top-Notch Construction
♕A+ Builder

Lalit Kaushik

Call On 98183-12077 For More Info On This Luxurious Park Facing Apartment For Sale In Neeti Bagh

http://wa.me/919818312077

Follow @royalerealtorsindia on social media
Checkout Our Other Listings Here
ROYALE REALTORS INDIA

Royale Realtors India – Luxury Real Estate

19 DDA Market, Shanti Niketan, New Delhi, Delhi 110021

***Images used are for reference purposes only.
